title.rendered: UKZN InQubate and CAES Innovation Competition

content.rendered:
UKZN InQubate in collaboration with the College of Agriculture and Engineering and Science are sending an invitation to research academic staff and post graduate students to enter an innovation competition.

Interested individuals are requested to send a two page application to Mandla Hlongwane at HlongwaneM4@ukzn.ac.za by 05 October 2018 following guidelines listed below:

  1. Details on the technology innovation & stage of development
  2. Clear description of the Intellectual property
  3. Commercial: Identification of companies working in the area of interest; potential or actual industry interest is beneficial.
  4. Budget: Budget in alignment to a project plan
  5. Team: Suitability and capacity of team to execute plan

Interested individuals who want to ONLY attend the competition session are welcome to send RSVP to DubeZ3@ukzn.ac.za by 14 October 2018.

View more information here.
